name: Mitzi and the Endless Night DEMO
name_original: Mitzi and the Endless Night DEMO
description:
Mitzi and the Endless Night is a pixel art platforming adventure starring a girl with snowball-throwing powers. Help Mitzi on her quest to banish the dark spirits who have invaded her home and reverse the curse of endless night!

This demo consists of the tutorial, first level, and some side levels.

Music by Catboss.
